description.value: A set of codes that describe the manner in which an addressed is used.

definition.value: An automated answering machine used for less urgent cases and if the main purpose of contact is to leave a message or access an automated announcement.
A contact specifically designated for use in emergencies.
A communication device that moves and stays with its owner.
A paging device suitable to solicit a callback or to leave a very short message.
Method of communication which uses telephone lines to send and receive printed documents between facsimile devices.
The type of telecom system was not specified for the given number.
